alert.note: Alert for Boone; Marion (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 5:22AM CDT until July 14 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Marion County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Boone County in north central Arkansas... * Until 600 AM CDT. * At 522 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Diamond City, or 17 miles west of Bull Shoals, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Diamond City... Lead Hill... Price Place... Ozark Isle... South Lead Hill... Peel... Oakland... Monarch... Bull Shoals Lake... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
